description: An interactive circular timer with draggable tick marks and animated rolling digit display. Features a radial tick-mark interface with pan gesture control, countdown timer functionality with interval management, and a sophisticated digit rolling animation with blur effects and intelligent zero-hiding. Includes haptic feedback, spring-based animations, and seamless timer state management.
main_features: Circular draggable slider with radial tick-mark visualization
Mathematical transformation from linear translation to circular radians
Countdown timer with automatic interval management
Rolling digit counter with up to 5 digits (configurable)
Dynamic blur effect on digit transitions (iOS only)
Intelligent leading zero hiding with opacity and translation animations
Haptic feedback on slider progress changes
Pan gesture handling with decay animation on release
Timer completion callback with alert notification
Start/stop/reset timer controls with ref-based API
Individual tick lines positioned using trigonometric calculations
Gradient overlays on digit container for smooth fade effects
Timer state management preventing interaction during countdown
Responsive layout adapting to window dimensions

file_structure.src/index.tsx: Main app component orchestrating timer, slider, and controls
file_structure.src/components/animated-count/animated-c: Container managing array of AnimatedDigit components
file_structure.src/components/animated-count/animated-d: Individual digit with vertical scroll, blur, and scale animations
file_structure.src/components/draggable-slider/index.ts: Circular slider with pan gesture and tick-line rendering
file_structure.src/components/draggable-slider/componen: Individual tick line with trigonometric positioning
file_structure.src/components/draggable-slider/hooks/us: Timer logic with interval management and completion handling
file_structure.src/components/draggable-slider/types.ts: TypeScript type definitions for slider props
file_structure.src/hooks/useToggle.ts: Simple boolean toggle hook for timer enable/disable state
file_structure.src/utils/haptics.ts: Haptic feedback utility with platform-specific logic

react-native-reanimated.critical_feature: useDerivedValue for digit extraction and radian conversion

react-native-gesture-handler.usage: Pan gesture for circular slider dragging with decay animation

react-native-worklets.purpose: Bridge worklet callbacks to JS thread for onProgressChange
react-native-worklets.critical_for: Calling haptic feedback and updating animated number from UI thread

expo-haptics.usage: Light haptic feedback on slider progress change
expo-haptics.platform_note: iOS only - Android disabled due to 'weird' haptics

expo-blur.usage: Dynamic blur effect on digit changes (iOS only)
expo-blur.animation: Blur intensity 0-17 based on isChanging state

expo-linear-gradient.usage: Top and bottom gradient overlays on digit container for smooth fade

pressto.usage: Animated button for timer start/stop with scale feedback

circular_slider_transformation.pattern: Linear translation mapped to circular radians via interpolation
circular_slider_transformation.core_concept: Treat circle circumference as a straight line, map translation to angle
circular_slider_transformation.offset: Math.PI / 2 (90-degree rotation to start at top)
circular_slider_transformation.author_insight: Lines 36-45 explain the mathematical approach in detail

tick_line_positioning.pattern: Trigonometric positioning of lines around circle
tick_line_positioning.disabled_state: Color fades to 'rgba(222, 208, 208, 0.525)' when timer running

digit_rolling.trick: All 10 digits rendered vertically, translation moves visible digit into view
digit_rolling.effect: Smooth rolling counter animation with scale feedback

digit_blur_effect.pattern: Dynamic blur intensity based on isChanging state (iOS only)
digit_blur_effect.state_tracking: useAnimatedReaction watches digit changes, sets isChanging
digit_blur_effect.purpose: Motion blur effect during digit transitions

zero_hiding.pattern: Opacity + translation based on leading zero detection
zero_hiding.effect: Leading zeros fade out and remaining digits slide left to stay centered

lifecycle.onFinalize: withDecay({velocity: velocityX}) or reset if progress > 0

pan_gesture_with_decay.decay_effect: Natural deceleration when released with velocity
pan_gesture_with_decay.boundary_handling: If progress > 0, animate back to 0 with timing
pan_gesture_with_decay.timer_lock: All gesture callbacks return early if isTimerEnabled

gradient_overlays.pattern: Top and bottom LinearGradient for smooth fade effect
gradient_overlays.purpose: Smooth fade at edges of digit container

timer_countdown.cleanup: clearInterval on completion, stop, reset, or unmount

shared_values.name: animatedNumber
shared_values.updates: Updated in onProgressChange callback from slider
shared_values.purpose: Current timer value in seconds driving digit display

shared_values.name: progress
shared_values.updates: Pan gesture onUpdate and timer interval
shared_values.purpose: Slider position in pixels (negative for countdown)

shared_values.name: previousProgress
shared_values.purpose: Stores gesture start position for relative dragging

shared_values.name: isTimerEnabled
shared_values.purpose: Locks slider during countdown, changes tick line colors

shared_values.name: isChanging
shared_values.purpose: Tracks digit transitions for blur and scale effects

derived_values.name: digit
derived_values.purpose: Extract specific digit from count value

derived_values.name: isVisible
derived_values.purpose: Determine if digit should be visible (hide leading zeros)

derived_values.name: progressRadiants
derived_values.purpose: Convert linear progress to circular radians for tick positioning

derived_values.name: isChangingProgress
derived_values.purpose: Smooth transition for blur intensity (0 to 1)

derived_values.name: blurIntensity
derived_values.purpose: Dynamic blur intensity for iOS BlurView

useAnimatedReaction.callback: Calculate seconds from radians, call onProgressChange
useAnimatedReaction.purpose: Convert radians back to seconds and notify parent
useAnimatedReaction.threading: Bridges UI thread to JS thread for callback

useAnimatedReaction.callback: Set isChanging = true, schedule reset after 200ms
useAnimatedReaction.purpose: Detect digit changes for blur effect

getDigitByIndex.logic: Pad count with zeros, split to array, extract digit at position
getDigitByIndex.purpose: Extract individual digits from number in worklet context

scheduleOnRN_usage.purpose: Trigger haptic feedback from UI thread
Schedule state reset on JS thread from animated reaction

memo_components.AnimatedDigit: Prevents re-render when sibling digits change
memo_components.AnimatedCount: Prevents re-render when parent state changes
memo_components.benefit: With maxDigits=5, only 1 digit re-renders per value change

useMemo_optimizations: Prevent style object recreation on every render

worklet_math.benefit: No bridge crossing for digit extraction or positioning

conditional_rendering.tick_lines: All rendered once, positioned via transform
conditional_rendering.digits: All 10 digits per position rendered once, animated into view

ref_based_timer_control.benefit: No prop drilling, direct timer control

haptic_debouncing.pattern: Called on every progress change from worklet
haptic_debouncing.platform_check: iOS only to avoid 'weird' Android haptics
haptic_debouncing.note: Could benefit from throttling for very fast drags

component_architecture.separation: Clear separation: app, slider, timer, digits, hooks, utils
component_architecture.nested_structure: src/ folder with organized component hierarchy

documentation.todo_notes: Author mentions plans for improvements to comma handling

error_handling.validation: Checks for zero value before starting timer
error_handling.cleanup: Proper interval cleanup on unmount and timer stop

areas_for_improvement: Timer implementation could use react-native-background-timer (author acknowledges)
Haptic feedback could be throttled for performance
isChanging reset timing could be more sophisticated (author acknowledges line 119)
Could extract magic numbers to constants
Timer completion callback could be more robust

timer_interval_limitation.issue: Uses standard setInterval, may pause in background
timer_interval_limitation.workaround: Runs on Expo Go for simplicity

fixed_max_digits.issue: maxDigits (5) must be known in advance
fixed_max_digits.trade_off: Pre-render empty digits vs. dynamic rendering

haptics_android.limitation: Disabled on Android due to 'weird' haptics

isChanging_timing.author_note: Lines 117-121 acknowledge this could be improved

gesture_lock_timing.limitation: Can't adjust timer once started (must stop first)

features: Save presets for common timer durations
Time input via number pad as alternative to slider
Display formatted time (MM:SS instead of seconds)
customization: Configurable tick line colors and sizes
Variable radius for different screen sizes
accessibility: Screen reader announcements on time changes
Reduced motion support (disable blur, instant transitions)
performance: Throttle haptic feedback to reduce overhead
Optimize isChanging reset with cancelable timeout
Optimize for very large tick counts (>200)
ux_enhancements: Tap on circle to set time directly
Visual feedback for timer completion (flash, pulse)
Show elapsed vs. remaining time toggle
technical: Add analytics tracking for timer usage
Persist timer state across app restarts

key_insights.circular_transformation_math: Treating circle circumference as a straight line (2Ï€r) enables intuitive linear-to-circular mapping via interpolation
key_insights.trigonometric_positioning: Tick lines positioned with cos/sin for x/y and atan2 for rotation - fundamental pattern for circular UIs
key_insights.digit_stacking_optimization: Rendering all 10 digits vertically and translating is more performant than conditional rendering
key_insights.worklet_bridge_pattern: scheduleOnRN essential for calling JS callbacks (haptics, state updates) from UI thread
key_insights.blur_state_tracking: useAnimatedReaction + setTimeout pattern enables motion blur effect synchronized with digit changes
key_insights.gesture_decay_feel: withDecay on gesture release provides natural, physics-based deceleration
key_insights.ref_based_timer_api: useImperativeHandle exposes timer control without prop drilling - clean parent-child communication
key_insights.zero_centering_technique: Coordinated opacity + translation keeps visible digits centered as leading zeros hide
key_insights.timer_interval_trade_off: setInterval sufficient for Expo Go, but production needs background-safe alternative
key_insights.platform_specific_features: Graceful degradation (haptics iOS-only, blur iOS-only) maintains cross-platform functionality

for_beginners: Toggle state management with custom hook
for_advanced: Performance optimization with memo and worklets
Advanced gesture handling with state locks
